ovdesc.p: This table will be used to define the buckets. The buckets will consist of from date and to date with respect to the PD. It should be defined.
Record with ID equal to valid company ID is to be created

desc.p: Fields NO.FROM to NO.TO holds the range for which bucket can be defined.This field holds the number of days PD From.
This field holds the number of days PD to.
For each NO.FROM to NO.TO, a bucket should be defined.
